title: Republish app to fix deployment error

requirements.summary: Republish the application to resolve canister deployment error and generate a valid working URL
acceptanceCriteria: App is successfully deployed to the Internet Computer
A valid canister URL is generated that does not return Error 400
The URL successfully loads the apology message interface with Maham's name, hearts, and flowers
The canister ID is properly resolved by the Internet Computer gateway

file_operations.description: Verify HTML structure is deployment-ready with proper meta tags and module script references for production build
Verify the interactive apology reveal component renders correctly in production, ensuring all animations (hearts, flowers, reveal) work after deployment
Verify global styles including pink/red gradient background, Playfair Display font imports, and custom animations (fade-in, reveal, floating) are production-ready
Verify React application entry point correctly initializes QueryClient and renders the App component for production deployment
Verify Tailwind configuration with OKLCH color palette and Playfair Display font is properly processed during build
